body: This can be a photograph, photocopy or scan of the original document.

components.hint: This can be a copy of their driving licence or passport. Maximum size: 7MB per file
components.label: Photo ID
components.name: auto_name__30

components.hint: This can be a copy of a bill in their name and must be dated within the last 3 months (For example an electricity bill or council tax bill). Maximum file size: 7MB
components.label: Proof of address
components.name: auto_name__31

heading: Upload their ID
lede: You must upload both proof of ID and address.
